MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  We are arranging to have engineers investigate the fault, and we hope to have your electricity restored by 19-NOV-2020 14:54.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the KA2 postcode area of Kilmarnock, affecting properties in Crossdene Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.51am. Our engineers are on their way to the Springhill substation to investigate a blown fuse and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.15pm on Thursday 19th November 2020.
